div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2189 Sicily, date unknown Burial: early 3rd cent. B.C. (K) Contents: 23 AR Pegasi Corinth: 16 (incl. most of Per. V) 1 trihemidr. (cuirass) 2 dr. Ambracia: 1 (as Ravel 64) Argos: 1 Leucas: 1 (caduceus) Unc.: 1 Disposition: Palermo Tusa Cutroni, AIIN 1956, p. 208, no. XIV
